data.title: Department of Elections
data.meta_description: We conduct free, fair, and functional elections for the City and County of San Francisco.
data.text:
Help decide the future of our city, state, and country by participating in this election and encourage your friends and family to do the same!

Ways to vote

You can choose to cast your ballot by mail or in person.

Vote in person

You can vote at a polling place or at the Voting Center.

Vote by mail

We now mail a ballot to every local voter in every election. Voting by mail is convenient and secure.

New voters

Find out how to register and vote if you are a first-time voter in San Francisco.

Language access

You can get voting materials and ask for help in your language.

Accessible voting

Learn about resources we offer to ensure all voters can vote with ease.
